name: Ato Ato no Mi
description: Allows the user to transform people and objects into abstract art, rendering them unable to function. Eaten by Giolla.

name: Awa Awa no Mi
description: Allows the user to create and control soap bubbles that can clean anything, including cleaning the strength off an opponent. Eaten by Kalifa.

name: Baku Baku no Mi
description: Allows the user to expand their mouth and eat anything, as well as allowing them to transform their body to replicate the characteristics and function of anything they've eaten in the past 24 hours. Eaten by Wapol.

name: Bane Bane no Mi
description: Allows the user to turn their body and limbs into springs. Eaten by Bellamy.

name: Bara Bara no Mi
description: Allows the user to split their body into separate pieces, which they can manipulate and levitate through the air. It also makes them immune to slashing attacks. Eaten by Buggy.

name: Bari Bari no Mi
description: Allows the user to create barriers by crossing their fingers. The barriers can also be shaped into constructs. However, the user is limited to only one barrier at a time. Eaten by Kurozumi Semimaru until his death and later eaten by Bartolomeo.

name: Bata Bata no Mi
description: Allows the user to create and control butter. Eaten by Charlotte Galette.

name: Beri Beri no Mi
description: Allows the user to split their body into many spheres. Eaten by Very Good.

name: Beta Beta no Mi
description: Allows the user to create and control mucus. Eaten by Trebol.

name: Bisu Bisu no Mi
description: Allows the user to create and control biscuits. Eaten by Charlotte Cracker.

name: Bomu Bomu no Mi
description: Allows the user to create explosions from their body, as well as give explosive properties to their bodily secretions. Also makes the user immune to explosions. Eaten by Gem.

name: Buki Buki no Mi
description: Allows the user to transform their body into any kind of weapon. Eaten by Baby 5.

name: Buku Buku no Mi
description: Allows the user to manipulate books, as well as trap people inside them. Eaten by Charlotte Mont-d'Or.

name: Chiyu Chiyu no Mi
description: Allows the user to heal people's wounds. Eaten by Mansherry.

name: Choki Choki no Mi
description: Allows the user to transform parts of their body into scissors. Anything cut by these scissors briefly gains the properties of paper. Eaten by Inazuma.

name: Deka Deka no Mi
description: Allows the user to greatly increase the size of their body. Eaten by Sanjuan Wolf.

name: Doa Doa no Mi
description: Allows the user to create and open doors on anything, including walls, living beings, and even the air itself. Eaten by Blueno.

name: Doku Doku no Mi
description: Allows the user to create and control poison. Eaten by Magellan.

name: Doru Doru no Mi
description: Allows the user to create and control candle wax. Eaten by Galdino.

name: Fude Fude no Mi
description: Allows the user to create and control ink, as well as manifest and manipulate anything they draw using a brush. Eaten by Kurozumi Kanjuro until his death.

name: Fuku Fuku no Mi
description: Allows the user to create clothing. Eaten by Kin'emon.

name: Fuwa Fuwa no Mi
description: Allows the user to fly, as well as giving them the power to make any non-living things they've touched levitate. Eaten by Shiki.

name: Gabu Gabu no Mi
description: Unknown alcohol-based powers. Eaten by Vasco Shot.

name: Gasu Gasu no Mi
description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into gas. Eaten by Caesar Clown.

name: Giro Giro no Mi
description: Allows the user to see through solid objects and over vast distances, as well as see into people's minds and memories. The user achieves this by forming a circle with their index finger and thumb and looking through it. Eaten by Viola.

name: Gocha Gocha no Mi
description: Allows the user to fuse themselves with other people. Eaten by Charlotte Newshi.

name: Gomu Gomu no Mi
description: Turns the user's body into rubber, giving them the power to stretch, bounce, and inflate, as well as making them immune to electricity and near impervious to blunt-force attacks and bullets. Eaten by Joy Boy until his death and later eaten by Monkey D. Luffy.This fruit was originally called the Hito Hito no Mi, Model: Nika and was classified as a Mythical Zoan before being renamed by the World Government.

name: Goro Goro no Mi
description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into lightning. Eaten by Enel.

name: Gura Gura no Mi
description: Allows the user to create quakes and shockwaves. Considered to be the most powerful Paramecia. Eaten by Edward Newgate and later stolen from him by Marshall D. Teach upon his death.

name: Guru Guru no Mi
description: Allows the user to make any part of their body spin like a propeller. Eaten by Buffalo.

name: Hana Hana no Mi
description: Allows the user to sprout duplicates of their body parts from any nearby surface. The user maintains full control of duplicated limbs and can perceive sights and sounds remotely through duplicate eyes and ears. Eaten by Nico Robin.

name: Hebi Hebi no Mi, Model: Anaconda
description: Allows the user to become a full anaconda or a half-anaconda hybrid. Eaten by Boa Sandersonia.

name: Hebi Hebi no Mi, Model: King Cobra
description: Allows the user to become a full king cobra or a half-king cobra hybrid. Eaten by Boa Marigold.

name: Hebi Hebi no Mi, Model: Yamata no Orochi
description: Allows the user to become a full Yamata no Orochi (an eight headed snake) or a half-Yamata no Orochi hybrid. Eaten by Kurozumi Orochi until his death.

name: Hie Hie no Mi
description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into ice. Eaten by Kuzan.

name: Hira Hira no Mi
description: Allows the user to give anything they touch the properties of fabric, making it thin, flexible, and fluttering. They can also bestow the properties of fabric onto their own body. Eaten by Diamante.

name: Hito Hito no Mi
description: Allows an animal that eats it to become a full human or a half-human hybrid, as well as grant them human-like intelligence and the ability to speak. Eaten by Tony Tony Chopper.

name: Hito Hito no Mi, Model: Daibutsu
description: Allows the user to become a full Daibutsu (a giant gold Buddha) or a half-Daibutsu hybrid. Eaten by Sengoku.

name: Hito Hito no Mi, Model: Onyudo
description: Allows the user to become a full onyudo (a monk yokai) or a half-onyudo hybrid, as well as grant them human-like intelligence and the ability to speak. Eaten by Onimaru.

name: Hobi Hobi no Mi
description: Allows the user to turn people into subservient living toys, simultaneously erasing any memory of the victim from the minds of others. It also halts the user's aging. Eaten by Sugar.

name: Horo Horo no Mi
description: Allows the user to create and control ghosts with different abilities, such as inflicting feelings of despair on people whom they pass through, or exploding with great force. The user can also make their own ghost leave their body as a form of astral projection. Eaten by Perona.

name: Horu Horu no Mi
description: Allows the user to create various special hormones that can alter a person's body in various ways. The user can also turn their fingers into syringes that they can use to inject the hormones into a person's body. Eaten by Emporio Ivankov.

name: Hoya Hoya no Mi
description: Allows the user to summon a powerful warrior genie from their body by rubbing their belly. Eaten by Charlotte Daifuku.

name: Inu Inu no Mi, Model: Dachshund
description: Allows the user to become a full dachshund or a half-dachshund hybrid. In the case of Babe's bazooka-like gun Lassoo, he became a dachshund/gun hybrid.

name: Inu Inu no Mi, Model: Jackal
description: Allows the user to become a full jackal or a half-jackal hybrid. Eaten by Chaka.

name: Inu Inu no Mi, Model: Kyubi no Kitsune
description: Allows the user to become a full nine-tailed fox or a half-nine-tailed fox hybrid. Eaten by Catarina Devon.

name: Inu Inu no Mi, Model: Okuchi no Makami
description: Allows the user to become a full Okuchi no Makami (a wolf deity) or a half-Okuchi no Makami hybrid. Eaten by Yamato.

name: Inu Inu no Mi, Model: Tanuki
description: Allows the user to become a full tanuki or a half-tanuki hybrid. In the case of Kouzuki Sukiyaki's teapot Bunbuku, he becomes a tanuki/teapot hybrid.

name: Inu Inu no Mi, Model: Wolf
description: Allows the user to become a full wolf or a half-wolf hybrid similar to a werewolf. Eaten by Jabra.

name: Ishi Ishi no Mi
description: Allows the user to assimilate into and control stone. Eaten by Pica.

name: Ito Ito no Mi
description: Allows the user to create and control strings. Eaten by Donquixote Doflamingo.

name: Jake Jake no Mi
description: Allows the user to transform into a whole-body jacket and control the body of the person wearing them. While being worn, the user can take advantage of both their own physical abilities and those of the person wearing them. Eaten by Kelly Funk.

name: Jiki Jiki no Mi
description: Allows the user to manipulate magnetic forces. Eaten by Eustass Kid.

name: Juku Juku no Mi
description: Allows the user to rapidly mature and decay any person or object they touch. Eaten by Shinobu.

name: Kage Kage no Mi
description: Allows the user to manifest and control shadows. They can animate and freely manipulate their own shadow, as well as steal and absorb other people's shadows, making the user bigger and stronger. Stolen shadows can also be implanted into corpses, reanimating them. Eaten by Gecko Moria.

name: Kame Kame no Mi
description: Allows the user to become a full turtle or a half-turtle hybrid. In the case of Pekoms, he resembles a Tarasque.

name: Kibi Kibi no Mi
description: Allows the user to create delicious, but non-nourishing "dango" from their cheek by pinching it. Any animal that eats one of these dango is tamed and becomes subservient to the user for a month. Eaten by Tama.

name: Kira Kira no Mi
description: Allows the user to transform their body into diamond. Eaten by Jozu.

name: Kiro Kiro no Mi
description: Allows the user to increase or decrease their body weight at will, anywhere between 1 and 10,000 kilograms. Eaten by Mikita.

name: Kobu Kobu no Mi
description: Allows the user to rally people into fighting and awaken their latent potential. Eaten by Belo Betty.

name: Kuku Kuku no Mi
description: Allows the user to transform objects into bad tasting, but nutritious food. Eaten by Streusen.

name: Kumo Kumo no Mi, Model: Rosamygale Grauvogeli
description: Allows the user to become a Rosamygale grauvogeli or a half-Rosamygale grauvogeli hybrid. Eaten by Black Maria.

name: Kuri Kuri no Mi
description: Allows the user to create and control cream. Eaten by Charlotte Opera.

name: Magu Magu no Mi
description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into magma. It ranks amongst the greatest attack power out of all the Devil Fruits.[29] Eaten by Sakazuki.

name: Maki Maki no Mi
description: Allows the user to create and control scrolls. These scrolls have special properties, including the ability to store objects inside them. Eaten by Raizo.

name: Mane Mane no Mi
description: Allows the user to transform into a physical lookalike of any person whose face they have touched. Eaten by Kurozumi Higurashi until her death and later eaten by Bentham.

name: Mato Mato no Mi
description: Allows the user to mark a person as their target by touching them so that any weapon thrown with that same hand will chase after the marked target. Eaten by Vander Decken IX.

name: Memo Memo no Mi
description: Allows the user to manipulate people's memories. Eaten by Charlotte Pudding.

name: Mera Mera no Mi
description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into fire. Eaten by Portgas D. Ace until his death and later eaten by Sabo.

name: Mero Mero no Mi
description: Allows the user to turn people that feel attraction to them into stone statues. Eaten by Boa Hancock.S-Snake possesses the artificial version of this fruit's power.

name: Mira Mira no Mi
description: Allows the user to create mirrors that can reflect attacks, as well as transform living things, including themselves, into a reflection of their chosen target. The user can also turn any mirror into an entrance to the Mirro-World. Eaten by Charlotte Brûlée.

name: Mochi Mochi no Mi
description: Allows the user to create, control, and even transform their body into mochi. Eaten by Charlotte Katakuri.This Devil Fruit is noted to be a "Special Paramecia".

name: Mogu Mogu no Mi
description: Allows the user to become a full mole or a half-mole hybrid. The user can also dig underground. Eaten by Drophy.

name: Moku Moku no Mi
description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into smoke. Eaten by Smoker.

name: Mori Mori no Mi
description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into flora. The user can become what is described to be a living forest. Eaten by Aramaki.

name: Muchi Muchi no Mi
description: Allows the user to force anything they whip to obey their orders. Eaten by Kujaku.

name: Mushi Mushi no Mi, Model: Kabutomushi
description: Allows the user to become a full rhinoceros beetle or a half-rhinoceros beetle hybrid. The user can also fly in either form. Eaten by Kabu.

name: Mushi Mushi no Mi, Model: Suzumebachi
description: Allows the user to become a full hornet or a half-hornet hybrid. The user can also fly in either form. Eaten by Bian.

name: Nagi Nagi no Mi
description: Allows the user to nullify sounds. Eaten by Donquixote Rosinante until his death.

name: Neko Neko no Mi, Model: Leopard
description: Allows the user to become a full leopard or a half-leopard hybrid. Eaten by Rob Lucci.

name: Neko Neko no Mi, Model: Saber Tiger
description: Allows the user to become a full saber-toothed tiger or a half-saber-toothed tiger hybrid. Eaten by Who's-Who.

name: Netsu Netsu no Mi
description: Allows the user to emit high heat from their body. Eaten by Charlotte Oven.

name: Nikyu Nikyu no Mi
description: Gives the user paw pads on their hands that can repel anything they touch. They can even repel intangible things like pain or memories out of a target's body and manifest it as a tangible paw-shaped bubble. Eaten by Bartholomew Kuma.S-Bear possesses the artificial version of this fruit's power.

name: Nomi Nomi no Mi
description: Allows the user's brain to store an indefinite amount of information and recall everything they ever learn. It also causes their brain to expand continuously as a result. Eaten by Vegapunk until his death.

name: Nori Nori no Mi
description: Allows the user to control anything they ride. Eaten by Bluegrass.

name: Noro Noro no Mi
description: Allows the user to emit special unique photons. Anything hit by these photons will be trapped in a state of slow motion for 30 seconds. Eaten by Foxy.

name: Nui Nui no Mi
description: Allows the user to stitch things together. It works on both objects and living things. Eaten by Leo.

name: Numa Numa no Mi
description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into mud. The user is a "bottomless swamp", granting them an infinite amount of space inside their elemental body. The mud can also take on the properties of quicksand. Eaten by Caribou.

name: Ope Ope no Mi
description: Allows the user to manifest a large sphere of aura, inside which they can manipulate the fabric of space, allowing the user to teleport, telekinetically move things, cleave things without actually damaging them, reassemble things into various combinations, and generate high voltage energy. Eaten by an unknown doctor until his death and later eaten by Trafalgar D. Water Law.

name: Ori Ori no Mi
description: Allows the user to create iron bars from their body and create iron bindings on their opponents. Eaten by Hina.

name: Oshi Oshi no Mi
description: Allows the user to manipulate the ground as if it were made of clay. Eaten by Morley.

name: Oto Oto no Mi
description: Allows the user to morph their body parts into musical instruments and weaponize the sound waves they create. Eaten by Scratchmen Apoo.

name: Pamu Pamu no Mi
description: Allows the user to expand and rupture their body, as well as expand and rupture any inorganic object they touch. Eaten by Gladius.

name: Pero Pero no Mi
description: Allows the user to create and control candy. Eaten by Charlotte Perospero.

name: Pika Pika no Mi
description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into light. Eaten by Borsalino.

name: Poke Poke no Mi
description: Gives the user a pocket on their body where they can store objects, including very large objects that are bigger than the pocket holes themselves. The user can pull these stored objects back out at will. Eaten by Blamenco.

name: Riki Riki no Mi
description: Gives the user superhuman strength. Eaten by Jesus Burgess.

name: Ryu Ryu no Mi, Model: Allosaurus
description: Allows the user to become a full Allosaurus or a half-Allosaurus hybrid. Eaten by X Drake.

name: Ryu Ryu no Mi, Model: Brachiosaurus
description: Allows the user to become a full Brachiosaurus or a half-Brachiosaurus hybrid. Eaten by Queen.

name: Ryu Ryu no Mi, Model: Pachycephalosaurus
description: Allows the user to become a full Pachycephalosaurus or a half-Pachycephalosaurus hybrid. Eaten by Ulti.

name: Ryu Ryu no Mi, Model: Pteranodon
description: Allows the user to become a full Pteranodon or a half-Pteranodon hybrid. Eaten by King.

name: Ryu Ryu no Mi, Model: Spinosaurus
description: Allows the user to become a full Spinosaurus or a half-Spinosaurus hybrid. Eaten by Page One.

name: Ryu Ryu no Mi, Model: Triceratops
description: Allows the user to become a full Triceratops or a half-Triceratops hybrid. Eaten by Sasaki.

name: Sabi Sabi no Mi
description: Allows the user to rapidly rust anything they touch, including organic material. Eaten by Shu.

name: Sara Sara no Mi, Model: Axolotl
description: Allows the user to become a full axolotl or a half-axolotl hybrid. In the case of Caesar Clown's poisonous gas Smiley, it became an axolotl/poisonous gas hybrid until his death.

name: Shari Shari no Mi
description: Allows the user to turn their limbs into wheels. Eaten by Sharinguru.

name: Shibo Shibo no Mi
description: Allows the user to drain liquid from people and objects, as well as transfer that liquid into their own body, making them bigger and stronger. Eaten by Charlotte Smoothie.

name: Shiku Shiku no Mi
description: Allows the user to afflict others with diseases. Eaten by Doc Q.

name: Shima Shima no Mi
description: Allows the user to merge themself with an island itself and control its environment. Eaten by Avalo Pizarro.

name: Shiro Shiro no Mi
description: Allows the user to become a literal miniature living fortress equipped with cannons, as well as letting them shrink people and objects who enter their body and house them inside. Eaten by Capone Bege.

name: Soru Soru no Mi
description: Allows the user to extract souls/lifespan from people who fear them and use those souls to bring objects to life. These objects are subservient to the user. Objects brought to life with a fragment of the user's own soul are stronger than others. Eaten by Carmel until her death and later eaten by Charlotte Linlin.

name: Sube Sube no Mi
description: Makes the user's skin extremely smooth and slippery, causing attacks, objects, and even excess body fat to harmlessly slide off them. Eaten by Alvida.

name: Sui Sui no Mi
description: Allows the user to swim freely through solid ground and walls. Eaten by Senor Pink.S-Shark possesses the artificial version of this fruit's power.

name: Suke Suke no Mi
description: Allows the user to become invisible, as well as make anything they touch invisible. Eaten by Absalom until his death and later eaten by Shiryu.

name: Suna Suna no Mi
description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into sand. The sand can dehydrate any non-metallic substance it touches. Eaten by Crocodile.

name: Supa Supa no Mi
description: Allows the user to transform any part of their body into a blade, thus gaining slashing abilities and making their skin as hard as steel. Eaten by Daz Bonez.S-Hawk possesses the artificial version of this fruit's power.

name: Susu Susu no Mi
description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into soot. Eaten by Karasu.

name: Tama Tama no Mi
description: Gives the user's body the properties of an egg. When the shell is destroyed, the user will regenerate from the yolk in a stronger chicken-like form. It was eaten by Tamago.

name: Toge Toge no Mi
description: Allows the user to grow long, pointy spikes from their body that are strong enough to pierce through solid stone. Eaten by Zala.

name: Toki Toki no Mi
description: Allows the user to send themselves and others forward in time. Eaten by Kouzuki Toki until her death.

name: Ton Ton no Mi
description: Allows the user to drastically increase their body weight, by as much as thousands of metric tons. Eaten by Machvise.

name: Tori Tori no Mi, Model: Albatross
description: Allows the user to become a full albatross or a half-albatross hybrid. Eaten by Morgans.

name: Tori Tori no Mi, Model: Falcon
description: Allows the user to become a full falcon or a half-falcon hybrid. Eaten by Pell.

name: Tori Tori no Mi, Model: Phoenix
description: Tori Tori no Mi, Model: Phoenix (English version: Bird-Bird Fruit, Model: Phoenix)- Allows the user to become a full phoenix or a half-phoenix hybrid. Eaten by Marco.

name: Toshi Toshi no Mi
description: Toshi Toshi no Mi (English version: Age-Age Fruit): Allows the user to manipulate the aging process of any person or object. Eaten by Jewelry Bonney.

name: Uma Uma no Mi
description: Allows the user to become a full horse or a half-horse hybrid. In the case of Gan Fall's pet bird Pierre, he resembles a Pegasus.

name: Uma Uma no Mi, Model: Pegasus
description: Allows the user to become a full pegasus or a half-pegasus hybrid. Eaten by Stronger.

name: Uo Uo no Mi, Model: Seiryu
description: Allows the user to become a full Azure Dragon or a half-Azure Dragon hybrid. Eaten by Kaidou.

name: Ushi Ushi no Mi, Model: Bison
description: Allows the user to become a full bison or a half-bison hybrid. Eaten by Dalton.

name: Ushi Ushi no Mi, Model: Giraffe
description: Allows the user to become a full giraffe or a half-giraffe hybrid. Eaten by a non-canon New World pirate until his death and later eaten by Kaku.

name: Wapu Wapu no Mi
description: Allows the user to teleport themselves and others from place to place. Eaten by Van Augur.

name: Wara Wara no Mi
description: Allows the user to create and control straw. They can also create straw voodoo dolls, allowing the user to transfer the damage they take to the dolls and, by extension, the people connected to them. Eaten by Basil Hawkins.

name: Woshu Woshu no Mi
description: Allows the user to literally wash and fold a person as if they were laundry. It also makes the victim's heart cleaner. Eaten by Tsuru.

name: Yami Yami no Mi
description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into darkness. The darkness has strong gravitational properties, and the user has an infinite amount of space inside of their elemental body. Eaten by Marshall D. Teach.

name: Yomi Yomi no Mi
description: Allows the user's soul to return to the living world after dying, bringing the user back to life. The user can also make their returned soul temporarily leave their reanimated body and their soul exudes a freezing coldness that can be weaponized. Eaten by Brook.

name: Yuki Yuki no Mi
description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into snow. Eaten by Monet until her death.

name: Zou Zou no Mi
description: Allows the user to become a full elephant or a half-elephant hybrid. In the case of Spandam's sword Funkfreed, he becomes an elephant/sword hybrid.

name: Zou Zou no Mi, Model: Mammoth
description: Allows the user to become a full mammoth or a half-mammoth hybrid. Eaten by Jack.

name: Zushi Zushi no Mi
description: Allows the user to manipulate gravity. Eaten by Issho.
